name: Neat and Improved Jira
description: This style improves the look and feel of Jira Backlog view. I've added this as the default font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Merriweather+Sans
additional_info:
Following improvements are made:
  • Status is inline with Jira items
  • Status colors
  • Grayed out Done tasks
